well today started out pretty well.

i woke up early. 
i had a huge fucking breakfast.
got new icon pics.
days going great. pre-cal ok. i read alot of my book.
had some fun during current problems today 'filming' our movie thing.
but for some reason the whole entire time I was in that class I felt horrible.
my forehead was cold and clammy, I was sweating profusely, my stomach was churning, and my arms were really really fatigued, i thought that it couldnt mean that I am hungry because I had a big breakfast when I usually just wake up and not eat ANYTHING. well lunch came around and when I finally got some food in me I felt much better.
speaking of current problems there seems to be a new but old problem to just rise up kinda outta nowhere and start bitch slapping me. one of those problems you really don't know what to do about, how to react to it, how the problem will be or when it will be solved. if ever.

have a good day.
off to go fucking iron a football field banner. seriously.

EXTRA EXTRA! READ ALL ABOUT IT!!

and I just got amazing new icon pics. AMAZING. my current one isn't the funniest but is possibly my favorite. Jeff understands it. I LOIK IT ALAWT.

Your Animal Personality
Your Power Animal: Eagle Animal You Were in a Past Life: Whale You are active, a challenger, and optimistic. Hard-working, you are always working towards a set goal.
The Animal Personality Test
Your Career Type: Artistic
You are expressive, original, and independent. Your talents lie in your artistic abilities: creative writing, drama, crafts, music, or art. You would make an excellent: Actor - Art Teacher - Book Editor Clothes Designer - Comedian - Composer Dancer - DJ - Graphic Designer Illustrator - Musician - Sculptor The worst career options for your are conventional careers, like bank teller or secretary.
What's Your Ideal Career?
You Have a Melancholic Temperament
Introspective and reflective, you think about everything and anything. You are a soft-hearted daydreamer. You long for your ideal life. You love silence and solitude. Everyday life is usually too chaotic for you. Given enough time alone, it's easy for you to find inner peace. You tend to be spiritual, having found your own meaning of life. Wise and patient, you can help people through difficult times. At your worst, you brood and sulk. Your negative thoughts can trap you. You are reserved and withdrawn. This makes it hard to connect to others. You tend to over think small things, making decisions difficult.
What Temperment Are You?
Your IQ Is 100
Your Logical Intelligence is Below Average
Your Verbal Intelligence is Above Average
Your Mathematical Intelligence is Above Average
Your General Knowledge is Above Average
A Quick and Dirty IQ Test
Your Personality Profile
You are dependable, popular, and observant. Deep and thoughtful, you are prone to moodiness. In fact, your emotions tend to influence everything you do. You are unique, creative, and expressive. You don't mind waving your freak flag every once and a while. And lucky for you, most people find your weird ways charming!
The World's Shortest Personality Test
Your Personality Is
Idealist (NF)
You are a passionate, caring, and unique person. You are good at expressing yourself and sharing your ideals. You are the most compassionate of all types and connect with others easily. Your heart tends to rule you. You can't make decisions without considering feelings. You seek out other empathetic people to befriend. Truth and authenticity matters in your friendships. In love, you give everything you have to relationships. You fall in love easily. At work, you crave personal expression and meaning in your career. With others, you communicate well. You can spend all night talking with someone. As far as your looks go, you've likely taken the time to develop your own personal style. On weekends, you like to be with others. Charity work is also a favorite pastime of yours.
The Three Question Personality Test

Identity: Justin Haas Location: Square One Time: The beginning of hell. Objective: Be loved. Chance of completion: .3% Obstacles: Justin Haas Allies: Jeff Enemies:Not Jeff Side note: I am sorry. I need I want I have to..........feel like I am alive.

because right now I do not.

I want breakfast.

I am having breakfast.

I had breakfast.










neat concept.
I need someone to hold onto.

let's see if i can get 11 things that made my year great

i doubt it.......


11. I......did fairly well in the 7-on-7 football league I was in......
10. I got a job at Hardees..finally some income.
9. I had a car, i didnt have a car, I had car, I dont have a car....I finally have a car.
8. Kaysha and Chloe. nuff said.
7. I just may go to college after all.
6. The only part of my family that is still intact is still intact. We are stronger as a family even through our tough times with shit.
5. I've gotten closer to my mom, there was once a day, (just a year ago), that I thought I would never even speak to my mother at all. I'm soooo glad we have a relationship with each other.
4. Got the part of Aesop.....lol lol
3. Accomplished the role of Anthony Marston in Ten Little Indians.
2. Accomplished the assistant directing and (co-lead?) major role of Claudius, in Hamlet.
1. and the only person to get me through it all. Jeff. I've learned more about myself, Jeff, and the way life just has to be, because of Jeff. more than I couldve done alone.

well I did it.

Many many wasted opportunities to do fun things this Christmas break.

many many.

sooo...here's the deal. 
we are going to do things. yes you. and me. and all other people.....

no, just you. and me.

you know who you are, don't you?
WE ARE GONNA HAVE SOME FUN.

starting now, well...when you read this...and i contact you..or you contact me. 

"lets get together". 
i have wanted to do sooo many things....never did. 
I think we go back on Tuesday, right?
that means there's only three more nights and four days. and i think i work on one or two of those nights and the other night is gonna be at Beths, (which don't get me wrong, that will be fun, but we need more). 

and I have a question. why didnt anyone answer my questions that I posted earlier? hmm? i guess this is really silly to post a question and expect an answer concerning the questions i posted that did not get answered in the first place. does anyone read this? i could just ramble on about cactus fucking or broken table legs or the Popes' anal leakage and no one would know.....at all.
I love dog biscuits. and licking old people. and and i love licking old peoples dog biscuits.
and old dogs people biscuits.
you, as a person, do not matter. you suck. at everything. especially donkey dicks.
my nose is kinda stuffy for some reason. does anyone else besides me sit down when showering and try to zoom to the other side of the tub as fast as you can?....oh ok...me neither.......
do crackers make you crackers? I ate some earlier before I showered. maybe this explains the weird post. and the blue spots of light that keep randomly popping up before me. oh, and you was adopted. I am dead fucking serious. no one really loves you. or ever will.

i have another question.

so the only person that I can kiss on New Years 




is Jeff.

and I'm not sure if I'm supposed to be happy about it.

But it's hard to stand-up let alone to try to concentrate
I wish that everyone that I knew hadn't sold out to the man

luckily I have a PS2 to keep me company, i'll kick back wit Peyton, cruise with Earnhardt, race a Ford, kick someones ass on a bike, race in the future, or shoot someone in the fuckin head in Miami.

It's the End of the Year As We Know It (and I feel fine..) haha In the beginning of 2005... Did you have a boyfriend/girlfriend?: no How old were you?: 16. What was your outlook on the world?: not the best How were you doing at school/your job?: pretty well What did you most look forward to?: well, anxious about the play Did you make New Year's Resolutions?: nope. What was your biggest worry?: the play Who was your best friend?: Ben Wright What did you do with your spare time?: computer. What did you do for fun?: computer. ran around with ben at night In the middle of 2005-- the summer! Did you have a boyfriend/girlfriend?: for a little while.. Had your outlook on the world changed?: slightly What did you spend your summer(or winter) doing?: staying inside my damned house. Did you get tan?: a little. Who'd you hang out with, mainly?: nobody really, Jeff and Ben a little Did you go visit anywhere?: Gatlinburg What was your biggest worry?: .....no comment What was the most fun event that happened?: not a damn clue. And as the year draws to an end... And how's your relationship status now?: still single. How old are you?: 17 What major changes have happened since the year began?: where I live. Is your life any different from when it started this year?: yes, definitely. What thing that happened stands out in your mind?: cherl/kailee/moving out How have you changed?: I grew up a lot What was the most embarrassing moment?: idk When was your lowest point?: everytime I think of my dad Are you happy with how the year went?: I'm happy right now...if that counts What thing would you change if you could?: many different things. For 2006... What do you plan to not do that you did this year?: slack off in school Do you think it'll be better than this year?: hopefully. Do you think it'll be WORSE than this year?: God, how could it? i hope not What do you plan to do next year?: graduate, go to college What are your pre-New Year's resolutions?: not to have New Years resolutions Who are you spending New Year's Eve with?: hopefully my friends And to wrap it up.. What one thing would you like to say as the year is almost done?: It's been an amazing ride, maybe not 'fun-fun' amazing....but a 'roller-coaster-oh-shit-oh-wow-oh-damn-hold-on' amazing. and to my friends, i love you all. Jeff(winkwink), Ben, Beth(ohbaby), Kaysha, Chloe. and that wasn't in any order. (maybe it was backwards, you never know....lol)

You wanna take a trip with me? Let's fly! It'll be fun. Let's go!

OK, so we're partyin it up!! heck yes we are, we are having a blast.
it's four o'clock in the morning!! let's take an hour nap.

wake up! it's 5! ok so my Uncle Keith will now drive us to the airport, let's sleep on the way.
well we're checked in now. we're waitin in the airport, listenin to the Ipod.
well let's board the plane. neat plane. let's wait a sec for takeoff.
shheeeshhus!! we're going FAST. things get reaaal small in a hurry.
it's beautiful isn't it? heck yes it is. well after we're done sightseeing we'll watch my movie on my portable DVD player. The Stand. short flight tho. we're landing now.
wellll. we're in Atlanta. BIG FUCKIN place. let's go to the baggage claim.
we've been walking FOREVER. it's like a mile, no joke. 
well we've met with my mom, brother and stepdad at baggage claim.
let's go to the car. another long walk. 
on our way to the house, 2 hours away, over in Alabama. good time for a nap.
well we're here. nice place. nice neighborhood. let's get settled.
we'll be sleeping in the spare room. the computer room. 
well we're just hangin out, waiting for my moms friends to get here for a party.
they're here. my mom has great friends, very funny women. 
well the party's over. let's go to bed.

wake up! breakfast time. hmmm what to do what to do...
let's go play some football. we'll kick this neighbor kids' ass.
and we did.
well we're watchin a movie, The Skeleton Key. pretty good. 
let's play my new PS2 game, NASCAR 05. pretty fun. go to bed.

wake up! just hanging out with my brother. ehh, not a tremendous amount is happening. go to bed.

wake up! my mom is off of work today. we'll go shopping. stepdads at work. brothers doing something else. so we're goin to Montgomery. (pss, that's the capitol of Alabama) ok, we stopped by moms work real fast. we're stoppin in Target now, we got some gifts. let's go to the shopping..area, outlet, thing. lot's of shops. checkin em out. let's eat. well let's eat at Mexican version of a Subway, it's called like...Mooes or somethin. back to the shops. mom got more than I did. going back home. moms takin my brother shoppin now. (for me it turns out). stepdads home, mom and brother's back. stepdads takin us boys shoppin for mom. we're stoppin everywhere for gifts! well we got it all, let's go back. play some PS2...go to bed.

wake up! my grandma and grandpa is bringing my other brother over to visit for a cpl days. it's been a lil while now. oh he's here. we're just chillin. still playing PS2. checkin internet. moms bringin back some McDonalds. still playing PS2, go to bed.

wake up! doo-do-doo.....still playin PS2....dee-de-dee, checkin internet and such, twiddle the thumbs. it's evening. mom's home. we're going out to eat. we're there, crowded busy place. a Pub. hehe yea. well all I can think about is you. i don't have much of an appetite. no no no, you dont make me sick, its just that i dont feel like eating when i cant think straight. time to go home....well we're just hanging out, casually flippin through some pics of everybody in the family.......oh...wow..see this pic...see how happy i am, see the person next to me? so happy also....I'm fighting it...no..don't...I'm fighting it...I'm fi--.....I can't control it. I can not stop the tears. I can't. it hit me like a hammer. I MISS THEM SO DAMN MUCH......i'm posting about it on LJ....go to bed.

wake up! the big day. the family's comin over for christmas today!!! time's just kinda...goin i guess. well they're here. let's eat dinner. good food. well, it's just kinda..just me opening the gifts. everyone else is gonna have christmas on christmas. lol. well I ended up with money, a dvd.a PS2. a PS2 game and memory card. come clothes. and a kickass coat from Abercrombie and Fitch. boooYEA. well the family is leaving. say goodbye, MERRY CHRISTMAS!! play some of my new game, go to bed.

wake up! we're going home!!! up at 9-ish so we leave at 10, 2 hour drive there. well it's 12 and we're in the middle of a food court. hungry....we'll eat Wendy's. we're done eating....time to go to the terminal....say our teary goodbyes..wave...go through security...look back, wave. let's go. we'll just hang out for awhile until its time to board the plane. 1:30...let's go. we're on the plane. things get reaaaal small in a hurry again don't they? its still beautiful. well i'm done starin out the window. look here, i bought a Playstation magazine to read. let's read. interesting. cool. *ding* (Pilot) We're about 10,000 feet and plummeting fast...okay just kidding.....(ok i made that up, anyways)10,000 feet and blah blah.....*ding* i ask the gentleman next to me if he mentioned anything about speed, i would kinda like to know, just curious. well no, he didnt. the guy asks me if i have ever flown Frontier because they have a video screen on the backs of all seats so you know where, when, how, why, speed, altitude, and pilots' ass temperature. pretty cool. so he asks me where i'm from, Indiana. he lives in Colorado. we're still talking, he asks where in Indy do i live, i say north. he asks where. i say Elwood....turns out he was born in Mercy Hospital. wow. lived in Hobbs. school in Windfall. wow. small world. he's tellin us about his family and everything. it also turns out that he has a similar and possibly more interesting story than the coincidence of us actually meeting on plane. he was on plane and happened to be sitting next to a woman that is director of some archealogy thing, and after talking, she is related to John Wilkes Booth wife. an old old old cousin. well, it turns out that this guy. this Randy Bryan. is also, related to JWBs wife. an old old old cousin. pretty small world. anyways, we landed. Indy looks horrible. go to baggage claim. walk out..it's 3:20....we're waiting.................and waiting....yep, still waiting. just chillin outside, waitin. waitin. finally at 4:10 my cousin comes to pick us up. they thought we were supposed to land at 3:45....urrghh. ok. FINALLY we ARE GOING HOOOMMME!!!!......nope. gotta stop by my cousins relatives house and wrap some presents. JESUS MOTHERFUCKIN CHRIST! I WANNA GO HOME! I MISS MY FRIENDS! I WANT MY FAMILY! finally our ass in movin out the door. time to nap.

wake up! home....home..HOME!! i'm tired...go inside...nobody home. JESUS. gotta drop off my luggage and go to my aunts house for a miniature christmas party. pretty fun. had some fun. 10:00-ish. finally headin home!!....got some more clothes, an alarm clock, and a digital camera......home. 

Did you enjoy your trip?? I sure did.

rummaging through some pictures of times that are now lost.
i told myself to fight it but the tears won the war.
i wish we could repair our love no matter what the cost.
maybe go way back and fix what the future has in store.

tear stained face, i stare at the photo of me next to you.
what has happened? something to take us so far away.
i can only stop and think, hope that you care for me too.
I've never stopped thinking of you, not one single day.

------------------------------------

the back of my hands are wet from the tears i've wiped away, my cheeks won't dry, even my nose is starting to run. 
every dream I have is of you.
I've told myself to fight it, I've ignored it, it has been my secret gnawing burden.
I'm being torn up, inside out. this is not an excuse, it's the truth for my decline.

I wish I could tell you everything I feel. I love you.

I ran across a Victoria's Secret magazine......... and no, not anything bad, but i was genuinely looking at, well, let's face it, the models. this is one of the most beautiful women ever. ever.......ever. she doesn't even have to be nude. her face is amazing. i did my homework, the magazine doesn't give names so i looked and looked and looked. and looked. FINALLY!!! i luckily came across a picture of her with some other famous VS models. there is not one single site, not even on vs.com........anywhere!! that has VS model names if there are names there aren't any pictures. it's frustrating. especially for a guy............ anyways...here ya go guys. Alessandra Ambrosio the most beautiful woman ever. http://search.msn.com/images/results.aspx?q=Alessandra+Ambrosio&first=1&count=20&size=1p&color=both&FORM=PDIR I especially like these pics in particular....... http://search.msn.com/images/details.aspx?q=Alessandra+Ambrosio&color=both&size=1p&ht=300&wd=400&tht=96&twd=128&su=http%3a%2f%2fwww.celebswallpapers.com%2fAlessandra_Ambrosio%2fimage11.html&iu=http%3a%2f%2fwww.celebswallpapers.com%2fAlessandra_Ambrosio%2fwallpapers%2fAlessandra_Ambrosio_013.jpg&tu=http%3a%2f%2fimages.picsearch.com%2fis%3f9092207621563&sz=16 http://search.msn.com/images/details.aspx?q=Alessandra+Ambrosio&color=both&size=1p&ht=250&wd=200&tht=128&twd=102&su=http%3a%2f%2fwww.acmecelebs.com%2falessandra_ambrosio%2fbiography.htm&iu=http%3a%2f%2fwww.acmecelebs.com%2falessandra_ambrosio%2fmain_images%2fother.jpg&tu=http%3a%2f%2fimages.picsearch.com%2fis%3f853277875950&sz=15

Thanks to you I couldn't eat tonight. Usually when I space off There is no real reason. Usually when someone asks 'What are you thinking?' I can honestly reply with..'Nothing really.' Well...now when I space off....I'm thinking of you.* *---There are several people who fit into this category.--- Except--Many Different people, many different situations. "It is an important and popular fact that nothing is as it seems." I hope that is true.....for some things. and I hope that, for some things....the messages I am receiving from people are intended and purposeful. I hope. That's all I can do. On a lighter note..sorta. I am having alotta fun in Alabama. Lots. Although I miss you guys sooooo damn much. I got to thinking...(read above)..and it saddens me that the great times that I have had (most this year), they can not be replicated no matter how much I want them to. I wish they would come more often. This past year has been.....amazing. completely chock-full of.....everything. I have been on a journey. I have come to realizations of the heart and mind. (thank you Jeff) I have made so many friends and talked to more people. If you've been a friend you've read all of this and will reply, yay or nay. I want the Super Six to go to the movies on the 26th. I don't care what movie we see. We had been discussing going to go see King Kong but I think that Narnia movie would be pretty cool, I've heard it is. but I don't care. I am going to go try to see all of you Saturday night. maybe even Sunday if I am not busy and won't be intruding upon your family. but Monday, let's go.

Since Wednesday morning when I woke up..........I've slept 11 hours.
I've already posted about Thursday.
Friday--
Amazing.
What could be better than hanging out with the three most important girls to me?
nothing.
We had alot of fun, talking, getting pizza, playing pool, going to beths'.
they all watched Garden State, I was freakin tired. I still don't know what that movie was about.
I finally went back to my aunt and uncle's barn....so Jeff could stay forever. until 3:45 actually.
So I took an hour nap, left at 5 for the airport, and slept on the way there.
My flight left at 7:30-ish. 
I love flying. It's amazing how small things become, very very quickly.
Flying above three layers of clouds is an experience everyone must have.
The sun was rising while we were in the air. Beautiful.
It's really amazing that I could travel across the nation in 1 1/2 hours.

Soooo, I'm here in Alabama. Safe and sound. Already having tremendous fun.


But I miss you all anyways.

Wednesday night I did not sleep, AT ALL
I stayed up the whole time. I took a shower. ate. and was at school extra extra early!!
I totally bombed a pre-cal test. I didnt even try.
Josh, Josh, Chris and I filmed our ......'World Hunger' video for current problems
we went out to the nature center to film without even asking, idk if that's bad, but who cares.
the video is freaking hilarious. I love it.
Latin was real fun....i guess, we just stood around (well, I did) and ppl wrapped presents for the families. 
Practice was real productive. Nothing bad was said about what I did, she actually *gasp* said she liked my characterization......whoa..yea 
Kaysha and I talked for awhile about....everything. That was even more productive than practice.
Finally Jeff and I made it to Muncie to shop for our friends. Best Buy and Walmart.
wow.....money just doesnt like me..it never visits me and when it does it immediately has to leave.

we probably almost died a total of 9 times on the way through Muncie and 'out' of Muncie.
I let Jeff drive so he could fuckin find a damned school. We almost ended up in 3 different towns other than Muncie. I have a natural gift as a navigator. but does Jeff ever listen to me? hell no.

long day ahead of me. 

PAAARRTTYYY tonight!!! woo hoooo!! who wants to par-ty with the Raz man??
then....."I'm leavin, on a jet plane, don't know when I'll be back again.."

im going to bed. i was only able to catch a little shut eye while Jeff drove home. I have not slept since I woke up Wednesday morning.

AHA!! There you are! Ya know, I've been looking for you, silly. I've been real lonely without you. You always cheer me up. and make me laugh. you make others laugh, too. Where have you been lately? I remember all the good times we have had. Maybe we can be together, forever. and maybe together, we can make someone realize what a great combination we are. Hiding behind all of those monstrous heaps of sad You're lucky I found you before you was squashed. My 'Happiness'. isn't it great?

Hey, Good for you. I can't really place a finger on it....I feel crushed, idk why really. even Tom Petty couldn't cheer me up on the way home. maybe because of the combined... windshield wipers fuckin up practically zilch paycheck its fucking cold school is really really grim for me. i want to be able to make all of my friends happy, but can't Every single dream i have....there's my brothers...there's my dad. Maybe that's why I seem so distracted. I need something.....someone...to occupy my attention. Besides Everyone.

i think I am going to ITT Tech after I graduate. I will be going for CADD and drafting for two years. If i decide to, i can go another two years to be a video gaming designer. i will be attempting to be making it as an actor on the side of going to college. I'm pretty sure that when i graduate i will be quickly employed in my field. so I will continue to try to make it as an actor, and i wont be an out of work one. :) :) :) yay I talked to my representative. HA, my own personal representative. toured the place. discussed everything i want to do. took an admission test. its a test of 50 questions of logic, reasoning, some math, random knowledge. it is a timed test of 12 minutes, on the computer, they dont expect you to finish the test and you can skip a question if you dont know it or the Q will take too long. well i got out of the test and sat down with the guy to see how i did.... he was very solemn, asked me how i thought i had done....explained that i needed a score of 13 to pass. and that 40% of everybody who takes it fails. its a very hard test. believe me. every question progressively gets harder........ well........I scored 27, FUCKIN A!!! he was very impressed. so if my dad signs some papers, he's my legal guardian bologna stuff... I can go. I have been accepted.

This will be my last post for a long time. I might reply to some of your posts but I will not provide any inkling of an insight to my mind. All I do is almost nearly or completely fuck things up with my posts. Until I have an amazing and miraculous change of heart and mind I will not say a thing. 

The thing is.........the problem is...I care for too many people. Alot of people. My caring has probably confused everyone because I say alot of things about how I am feeling. I feel alot of things about alot of people. Its right then that I get stuck in a great big jam. I get torn into a thousand different directions. I choose one and *BAM* everything vanishes from reach. I am yet again standing alone, cold, in the dark, tears streaming, lost. 

I just want someone to have tremendous fun with. Listen. Talk. Hold. Laugh. 
I need someone to need me.
I need someone to be needed.

It may be alot to ask.... but is it really??.....
It seems to work for everyone else.

and I am happy for all of you...
just let me think for awhile....

So I am going to ask you all some questions, please answer them completely and honestly. I invite EVERYONE to answer.

 

  1. What is your relation/association/affiliation/position with me? Your full thoughts.
  2. What is your first memory and impression of me? Your full thoughts.
  3. Have you ever once (or even twice, lol) liked me? Why and when?
  4. If you have never liked me (even as a friend) why is it that you do not? Full explanation.
  5. What is the worst memory you have of me? One that you/ I/ both of us should regret/forget.
  6. What sort of future do you see between you and I? Or rather, what future do you hope we have?
  7. Do you find me to be funny? smart? attractive? or stupid? ugly? uncool? Full thoughts.
  8. Is there anything you wish for me to change about myself? Do you enjoy my company?
  9. Is there anything that is unsaid between you and I that you need to tell me? You don't have to tell me right now, but is there? Is there something that you feel I should say to you? If you wish, explain. It would help and I would appreciate it.

The Keys to Your Heart
You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free. In love, you feel the most alive when your lover is creative and never lets you feel bored. You'd like to your lover to think you are loyal and faithful... that you'll never change. You would be forced to break up with someone who was insecure and in constant need of reassurance. Your ideal relationship is lasting. You want a relationship that looks to the future... one you can grow with. Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment. You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred. In this moment, you think of love as commitment. Love only works when both people are totally devoted.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?

I remember people telling me that High School is the best days of your life.

they were wrong. at least that isn't the case for me.

high school has not been one single smidgeon of an ounce of fun for me. sure, theres been some interestingexhilaratingwildfun times. but,... oh,... I'll just guess...there's only been about four of those. i do not know exactly what i did those times, who i was with or why i was doing whatever it was i was doing. but i'm sure there have been at least four really cool things to happen to me so far that i will always remember and look back on saying, "I wouldnt change that for the world". I just can't remember them right now. thats how memorable my life has been so far.

Heck, i remember alot of things, but were they the greatest days of my life? nope. I look back on my years and ask myself what have they amounted to. I have failed myself this year so far in academics and I fucked around other years also. I am not a genius or a sports phenomenon. I'm not even that great of a guy. My future looks fucked and very bleak right now. I have only a few friends that i can count on to be there for me, which i can count on.... one hand. I have half of a family to support me. One half of that family blames alot of things on me and totally hates me...................

...............I do not have anybody to share these thoughts with privately.

No one to hold.

No one to hug.

No one to Kiss.

No one has ever fallen asleep in my arms (and been happy about it, lol) I have to use weak and sometimes even ill-timed humor to brighten things up.

Have i ever made anyone feel safe, happy, excited, or beautiful?

If I died tonight....what would be my happiest moment? crowning achievement? funniest joke? anything, what has my life accounted for. who would.. truly care? cry? ever be the same?....miss me?

I am going crazy. I am still "everyones friend" as i posted earlier. I am still happy-go-lucky Haas. but I am s.l.o.w.l.y slipping away from sanity. I need someone to look forward to seeing...... just as i need to know that she looks forward to seeing me.
